title: [Update: Official] Google getting Digital Wellbeing widget to show your screen time, most used apps
content:
Following new widgets for YouTube Music and Google Photos in December, Digital Wellbeing will soon get a screen time widget that shows how much you’ve been on your phone and the top Android apps being used.

more…

The post [Update: Official] Google getting Digital Wellbeing widget to show your screen time, most used apps appeared first on 9to5Google.
